Database¶

Schema¶

Description¶

In this project, one of the goals was to design a database-layout for Neotech’s software, where Neotech’s products could receive feedback.

The image above illustrates a possible database layout for these products and their feedbacks. As seen in the image, a product consists of an id and a name. A feedback consists of an id, rating, comment, time and product_id. In a database-case, the product_id attribute can be used to join feedbacks into a specific product.

The layout was designed this way, because a feedback should always have a target. A product may have any number of feedbacks, but a single feedback is always linked to only one product. Thus, a feedback may not exist if it’s target product stops existing as well (composition).
